addpeercluster.name: AddPeerCluster
addpeercluster.description: Grants permission to add a peer cluster to a multi-Region cluster

createcluster.name: CreateCluster
createcluster.description: Grants permission to create new clusters

createmultiregionclusters.name: CreateMultiRegionClusters
createmultiregionclusters.description: Grants permission to create multi-Region clusters. Creating multi-Region clusters also requires CreateCluster permission in each specified Region. **This action is deprecated as of 05/09/2025 and will be removed on 05/21/2025.**

dbconnect.name: DbConnect
dbconnect.description: Grants permission to connect to the database

dbconnectadmin.name: DbConnectAdmin
dbconnectadmin.description: Grants permission to connect to the database with admin role. Connecting with any other role requires DbConnect permission

deletecluster.name: DeleteCluster
deletecluster.description: Grants permission to delete a cluster and all of its data

deletemultiregionclusters.name: DeleteMultiRegionClusters
deletemultiregionclusters.description: Grants permission to delete multi-Region clusters. Deleting multi-Region clusters also requires DeleteCluster permission in each specified Region. **This action is deprecated as of 05/09/2025 and will be removed on 05/21/2025.**

getcluster.name: GetCluster
getcluster.description: Grants permission to get information about a cluster

getvpcendpointservicename.name: GetVpcEndpointServiceName
getvpcendpointservicename.description: Grants permission to retrieve the VPC endpoint service name for a cluster

listclusters.name: ListClusters
listclusters.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of clusters

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list all tags on an Aurora DSQL resource

putmultiregionproperties.name: PutMultiRegionProperties
putmultiregionproperties.description: Grants permission to update multi-Region properties of a cluster

putwitnessregion.name: PutWitnessRegion
putwitnessregion.description: Grants permission to configure and update the witness Region of a multi-Region cluster

removepeercluster.name: RemovePeerCluster
removepeercluster.description: Grants permission to remove a peer cluster from a multi-Region cluster

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add tags to Aurora DSQL resources

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from Aurora DSQL resources

updatecluster.name: UpdateCluster
updatecluster.description: Grants permission to modify cluster attributes
